tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Need to Know
programme.desc: As a favor from Congresswoman Lillian Dorning, SECNAV Sheffield asks the JAG staff to get the story of a submarine, USS Angel Shark (SSGN-559), which was lost on a CIA mission in 1968.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Harm serves as a judge and Mac is the contentious prosecutor in a case fraught withpolitical implications when an American aviator is charged with killing three Britishsoldiers during a flight mission in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shifting Sands
programme.desc: When a Gulf War MIA victim is found as the sheik’s wife in a nomadic Arab tribe, Bud prosecutes and Mac defends her against charges of desertion and, in a stunning turn of events, treason. Harm tries to get his old job back but is turned away.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Mac defends and Turner prosecutes in the case of a special op marine who, during an Iraqi mission, may have deserted his team for his own survival. Harm takes on a CIA training assignment in a mach six craft that soon has him in danger.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Close Quarters
programme.desc: Back at JAG, Harm is flooded with cases but still wants to help out an 80-year-old veteran accused of robbery. Meanwhile, Turner takes on an assignment in a sub whose crew has rescued possible defecting North Koreans.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Posse Comitatus
programme.desc: Harm and Mac argue the case of a Marine pilot who used force to interfere with a local police matter that led to a man’s killing. Roberts is the investigating officer in the matter of a Navy doctor who is requesting conscientious objector status.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Love Boat
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Going South
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Mexico when a tech billionaire hires them to rescue his kidnapped daughter.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Once Bitten, Twice Die
programme.desc: When a conflict in Eastern Europe threatens to escalate, Team Scorpion is called on to help facilitate secret peace talks to prevent World War III.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Young Hearts Spark Fire
programme.desc: While on a mission to save lost hikers, Team Scorpion's helicopter crashes, igniting a massive wildfire that quickly closes in on them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crossroads
programme.desc: To protect a key witness who is en route to testifying against a deadly drug cartel, Team Scorpion takes her on the run, with the cartel hot on their heels.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: Walter finally learns Cabe's long-kept secret regarding the Baghdad mission, and it threatens to tear Team Scorpion apart forever.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette starts the new series with an investigation at the haunted Eden Camp. Strange noises and an unknown force try to separate the team. Can they endure the entire investigation, or will the paranormal activity prove too much for them to handle?(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her world-famous team continue investigating Eden Camp. Splitting into lone vigils, they quickly regret it as lost souls, dark shadows, and disembodied voices haunt this living museum, all eager to make their presence known.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit this deserted old mansion which is way past its original splendour. They are soon surrounded by unexplained activity as something is following them and for at least two members of crew, they are pushed to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to the mysterious Guys Cliffe House, once a private dwelling, it is now home to the Fraternal Brotherhood of Freemasons. The team are followed by a very persistent poltergeist that will seem to stop at nothing to get their attention.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Lemp Mansion
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the TAPS team is invited to Lemp Mansion in St. Louis, Missouri. There have been tragic deaths at this mansion with the patriarch and three of his children taking their own lives.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted By Heroes
programme.desc: For Grant's second to last case with Ghost Hunters, TAPS revisits one of Grant's favorite locations, Mt. Washington, in New Hampshire. Last time TAPS was here, they caught one of the best EVP's ever.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Leper's Kiss
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.258
programme.desc: A custody battle, eBay sales dispute, and check fraud alleged in woman's lawsuit against child's father for storage fees. Man claims son illegally repossessed his motorcycle; son countersues for bike damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.131
programme.desc: Man sued by parents after second wife's mysterious death and $40,000 life insurance policy; alleged child abuse involved/Man calls cops to remove ex-girlfriend from apartment, sues her for rent after she leaves, fearing for his life.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.175
programme.desc: Man accused of cheating for 10 years alleges friend vandalized his car. Woman accused of violently kicking car while witnessing couple making out inside.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.99
programme.desc: Lawyer with 42 years clashes with Judge as ex-friends dispute Miami plane ticket cost/Repossessed car due to red light running, unauthorized driving, and missed payments.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.230
programme.desc: Judge Judy compares signatures on an allegedly forged contract between ex-friends who are fighting over expensive cosmetology classes.\t\t\t\r\nA 19-year-old girl is suing her ex-boyfriend for allegedly stealing her laptop computer.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.110
programme.desc: Custody of a beautiful, homemade baptismal gown is disputed by entranged family members/While driving with her five children in the car, a woman runs a red light, is arrested and is later sued by her uncle who claims he bailed her out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.112
programme.desc: Young woman sues foster family over deleted files/Ex-lover sued for loan, truck damage, and impound fees from prison romance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.142
programme.desc: Man sues mother of his child for selling his Baby Pac-Man game; she counters for harassment, alleging cheating. Man claims ex's obsession forced him to move; she sues for unpaid rent, electric bill.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.66
programme.desc: A woman and her niece wage war over impound fees on a Chevy Trailblazer, the cost of college tuition, and $92 dollars allegedly ‘stolen’ by a raccoon.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.160
programme.desc:
A karaoke business owner is suing his former employee for			
allegedly stealing a client and damaging his equipment.			
A $5,000 loan made from a cash advance on a credit card destroys			
a friendship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.48
programme.desc: Man accused of punching lover, sued for allegedly stealing bill money due to gambling habit/Woman uses inheritance to aid brother, demands repayment; he alleges false arrest and refuses payment.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: There are only five chefs left, but Ramsay is only taking a few with him on the trip to Las Vegas, and this causes envy and irritation among other competitors.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final four chefs impress at the start of dinner service, but things take a turn for the worse and no one in the kitchen is safe.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a surprising elimination, the remaining trio of chefs finds Ramsay testing their leadership skills.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the US, chefs compete against one another. Gordon Ramsay hosts the intense cooking competition where the winner will be given the chance to be a head chef, but first must prove themselves.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twelve aspirants try to impress Gordon Ramsay, as they compete for the post of head chef at a Las Vegas restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a disastrous opening night, both teams prepare for the next challenge; a contestant starts to succumb to the pressure; a challenge tests food-preparation skills; another chef must leave.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing the Role
programme.desc: First, Lou devises a plan to have Froy and Sonia pose as house buyers, and a happily married couple, meanwhile Matt and Lou will hook and book. Then, Matt and Froy wrangle with an out-of-work actor.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Broken Bones and Broken Phones
programme.desc: First, Froy, Lou, and Matt wrestle a group of bodybuilders when going after a Jeep Commander. Next, an unemployed stockbroker gets a rude awakening when Lou and Lyndah wake him up inside his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Hearse Isn't Empty?
programme.desc: Matt and Lou find themselves in an upscale neighborhood, facing off with a distraught accountant and his belligerent, kick-happy son. Then, Sonia and Froy crash a pool party where the guests were happy to give up their clothes, but they're not willing...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy Gets Beat Up
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou see the signs of the bad economy first-hand when a rich couple willing give up their late-model Landcruiser. Then, Matt and Sonia need to contend with a spoiled princess whose daddy forgot to pay the bill on her Jetta.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: This Is No Fantasy
programme.desc: First, Froy and Lyndah get a tip from a spotter that leads them to a late model sedan with cans tied to the bumper and an angry bride in the passenger side. Next, Matt has to step in when Froy starts to lose it with a group of fantasy football players.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Missing RV and the Private Jet
programme.sub-title: The Missing RV and the Private Jet
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy track down an RV that has been missing for 30 years, only to find that its owner is using it to cart around a group of impetuous young Canadian rock stars.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pyramid Scams and Princesses
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Matt wrangle with two belligerent truckers who will stop at nothing to protect their massive tractor-trailer. Next, a young girl learns that she's been a victim of a pyramid scam when Lyndah and Lou come for her car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: May Divorce Be With You
programme.desc: When Audrey invites her and Jeff's recently divorced out of luck friend Steve to stay with them for a few days, Audrey thinks she may have become Steve's newest rebound.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Poaching Timmy
programme.desc: When Timmy grows tired of dealing with Russell's demeaning demands and Audrey has had it with her terrible assistant, the two find a possible solution in working together. Meanwhile, Jeff tries to recreate the conditions that led to a Giants win.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old Timer's Day
programme.desc: Jeff tries to prove to Audrey he's young and spry and invites her to watch him play softball. While up at bat, a simple sneeze throws his back out, but he insists on playing in the tournament game.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Challenge
programme.desc: When Jeff, Russell, and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three put their thinking caps on and rise up to the challenge.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Four Pillars
programme.desc: To make Audrey happy, Jeff begrudgingly agrees to see a couple's therapist. Meanwhile, Russell develops a crush on Timmy's fiancé.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.(n)

programme.title: Ultrasound
programme.desc: A dark puzzle-box sci-fi in the vein of ‘Memento’ and ‘Primer’.(n)

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.(n)

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: An ex-con and his adopted younger brother are forced to go on the run. Chased by a criminal, the feds, and a cadre of soldiers, their only protection is a found weapon of mysterious ancestry.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: A pair of debt collectors are thrust into an explosively dangerous situation, chasing down various lowlifes while also evading a vengeful kingpin.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.(n)

programme.title: Shoelaces For Christmas
programme.desc: When Jennifer’s father forces her to volunteer at the shelter to teach her compassion and responsibility, she creates an unlikely bond with the staff and a special young guest which makes her realize the true meaning of Christmas.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: A group of orphans goes on a journey to restore the lost magic and save Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Sugar Baby Murder
programme.desc: After graduating from college, 21 year old Bridget moves to a new town with her best friend Lindsay. Desperately needing a job to support her budding writing career, she takes a job as an EA to business tycoon Anthony Gloss.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Before I Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Nell MacDermott loses her husband in a fiery boating accident and visits a psychic to connect with him again. But when she's informed that he was murdered, Nell is compelled to find the killer searching for an elusive witness who could solve the mystery.(n)

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.(n)

programme.title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Two people (Tom Atkins, Stacey Nelkin) discover that a TV commercial will cue a madman's (Dan O'Herlihy) Halloween masks to explode.(n)

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: Trapped townspeople (Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Laurie Holden) face monsters inside and out after a supernatural fog engulfs their Maine community.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: A black soldier returns from fighting in the Civil War only to find out that his mother, maid to a frontier family has been murdered by a gang of bandits. He becomes a bounty hunter, determined to track down and kill the men who killed his mother.(n)

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans
programme.desc: As Alice and Cora Munro attempt to find their father, a British officer in the French and Indian War, they are set upon by French soldiers and their cohorts, Huron tribesmen led by the evil Magua.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Miracle at Boot Hill
programme.desc: A man who claims he can resurrect the dead poses a problem for killer Bill Groat.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Truth Teller
programme.desc: A reporter probes reports that a general is selling guns to Natives in exchange for their property.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: A Sponge Full of Vinegar
programme.desc: In Totem, Idaho, Dorsey Bilger has told one tall tale too many.(n)

programme.title: Mandie and the Secret Tunnel
programme.desc: In 1899, Mandie's life changes when her Cherokee friends help her escape to a mansion that holds the hidden secrets of her past and the key to her future.(n)

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Holt (Cloak & Dagger), Skyler Gisondon (Booksmart) and Bruce Dern (The Senator). Two high school outsiders join forces to overtake the local school board.(n)

programme.title: Timber The Treasure Dog
programme.desc: A local villain is buying up all the ranches where 12-year-old Mickey and his family live, unless they can find a small fortune, they will lose theirs. Luckily, Mickeys dog Timber holds the clue to a legend of buried treasure.(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page are a brilliant mother and daughter con team who have their gift down to a fine art.(n)

programme.title: Bachelorette
programme.desc: On the night before an old friend's wedding, three frisky bridesmaids go searching for a little fun but find much more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Accidentally Engaged
programme.desc: Famous actor Chas Hunter and aspiring actress Clarissa Byers agree to fake an engagement to improve both their reputations. However, playing pretend starts to feel all too real as the two start to fall for one another.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.(n)

programme.title: Night of the Eagle
programme.desc: A sceptical college professor learns the true power of the occult when he attempts to rescue his wife from Satanists.(n)

programme.title: The House in Nightmare Park
programme.desc: A struggling actor is invited to a large country home to perform a dramatic reading. Outwardly, the host is complimentary and enthusiastic, but his more sinister intentions are eventually made clear.(n)

programme.title: The Uncanny
programme.desc: An author, convinced that cats are conspiring to replace the human race as masters of the earth, narrates three bizarre tales of feline terror.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Storyteller
programme.desc: In the early 20th century a young woman takes a job as a teacher in a one-room schoolhouse. One of her students, Mica, secretly takes extra books home to read.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Curious Case of Edgar Witherspoon
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Edgar Witherspoon
programme.desc: A woman tries to get her Uncle Edgar committed, believing that he is senile. The investigating doctor finds Edgar living in an apartment containing all kinds of junk.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Extra Innings
programme.desc: Ex-baseball player Ed Hamler, lame from an injury and forced to retire early is given a 1909 baseball card of a player that looks exactly like him. The card is magical in that he becomes drawn into it and lives out the life of the player in the past.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Crossing
programme.desc: A stressed-out priest repeatedly encounters a station wagon containing a young girl. The car keeps crashing and bursting into flames.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Hunters
programme.desc: A young boy falls into an undiscovered cave near a housing project. An archeologist studies strange paintings on its walls and then bizarre things begin to happen. Cave items move around and animals are killed and brought into the cave.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Dream Me a Life
programme.desc: A man in a retirement home dreams of a woman holding back a monster, and in real life realizes the woman is his cataleptic neighbor.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Antianeirai
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel travel to Istanbul to investigate the death of one Sydney's friends, a professor who was trying to prove Hercules did exist by finding the Belt of Hippolyte.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Faux Fox
programme.desc: When Nigel is charmed by brilliant student Lorraine to show her their offices (and kiss), a burglar knocks out Sidney, but what was robbed?(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Kush
programme.desc: Returning with an abnormal captured in the Himalayas, Magnus and Will are stranded from civilization and aid after their plane goes down in a desolate mountain range.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Nubbins
programme.desc: When a mating pair of cute, furry and seemingly harmless abnormals is brought in for scientific study, the Sanctuary team begins to exhibit some hidden animal attractions for one another.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Five
programme.desc: While leading a covert meeting in Rome, Magnus encounters Nikola Tesla, an old friend from her past who confides that the Cabal has come to exact revenge on her for the events in 'Fata Morgana'.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: A Witch's Calling
programme.desc: While Roxton and Malone search for the missing Veronica, two young witches lure them away from safety. Unbeknownst to the explorers, a sorceress and her disciples plot to destroy Challenger.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Malone is pierced by a poison dart from a Keeran blowdart. Under the influence of the hallucinogenic poison, Malone relives his nightmarish experience as a battlefield correspondent in WWI.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)
